remarks: Closure of vector subtraction in the dual of a vector space. (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ldualvsubcl.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
ldualvsubcl.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
ldualvsubcl.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` D ) $.
ldualvsubcl.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
ldualvsubcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
ldualvsubcl.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
ldualvsubcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G .- H ) e. F ) $.
